name: Hide & Seek
description:
Game based on old Hide&Seek game, known to most kids back in 90s. As host(bear) you need to catch(hug) other players. As client(kid) you need to run away from bear and make other kids lose by pushing them or throwing stone at them and letting bear catch them. You also have an objective of reaching the base (you can easily see it - particles will show you the way) - if you reach the base, you get the points.

Controls:
Bear:
w,s,a,d - movement
LMB - hug

Kid: w,s,a,d - movement
LMB - push - pushes another player (hider)
RMB - throw stone (stun+blind on unit hit) - 1 second cooldown
shift - dash - 15 second cooldownMade by:
